data.eml:eml: Azana atlantica, n. sp., with reduced mouthparts and two ocelli: first record of Azana for the Neotropical region (Diptera: Mycetophilidae: Sciophilinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Amorim, Dalton De Souza, Oliveira, Sarah Siqueira, Balbi, Maria Isabel P. A. (2008): Azana atlantica, n. sp., with reduced mouthparts and two ocelli: first record of Azana for the Neotropical region (Diptera: Mycetophilidae: Sciophilinae). Zootaxa 1789: 57-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182518
